typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'query',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	query: 'SELECT hp.HK_PROMOTION_ID,hp.PROMOTION_ID,sp.ITEM_ID  FROM DataVaultDB.dbo.HUB_PROMOTION hp  \nINNER JOIN DataVaultDB.dbo.SAT_PROMOTION sp \non hp.HK_PROMOTION_ID = sp.HK_PROMOTION_ID  ',
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED') ~> AzureSQLHubPromotion
source(output(
		HK_ITEM_ID as string,
		ITEM_ID as string,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSQLHubItem
AzureSQLHubPromotion, AzureSQLHubItem join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ITEM_ID,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinHubItemPromotion
JoinHubItemPromotion sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		HK_ITEM_ID as string,
		ITEM_ID as string,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		HK_ITEM_ID,
		ITEM_ID = item_id,
		LOAD_DTS,
		REC_SRC
	)) ~> AzureSQLLnkItemPromotion
